text: Next Stop, Greenwich Village is a 1976 American comedy drama movie directed by Paul Mazursky and starring Lenny Baker, Shelley Winters, Ellen Greene, Lois Smith, Christopher Walken, Bill Murray, Jeff Goldblum and Antonio Fargas. It was distributed by 20th Century Fox. ==Other websites== * * * Category:1976 comedy-drama movies Category:American comedy-drama movies Category:20th Century Fox movies Category:Movies directed by Paul Mazursky Category:1970s English-language movies Category:1970s American drama movies Category:American coming-of-age movies Category:Movies about Jews and Judaism Category:1970s romantic comedy movies Category:American romantic comedy movies Category:1970s romantic drama movies Category:American romantic drama movies Category:Movies about actors Category:Movies set in the 1950s Category:Movies set in Manhattan
title: Next Stop, Greenwich Village
